review: She is one of the few doctors who will listen to you and will answer all your queries patiently. Will do a thorough check and will understand the case really well before prescribing you the medicines. Her prescribed medicines worked really well for my daughter. After treating my daughter with some other doctor for 10 days, I decided to change the doctor as I did not see any improvement in her. So I found Dr. Sujata Chitnis profile here and thought of meeting her. Her way Of Diagnosis and handling my daughter gave the Vinod
Visited for cold cough of my 6month old.  Doctor was very helpful and genuine . Gives detailed advisory n explanation .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Good experience with the doctor and she was able to explain everything very well and suggest the right course of treatment
The doctor checked my baby thoroughly and gave proper treatment. Explained everything nicely . Gave tips for avoiding further sickness
Very experienced doctor. ******* ********* * ********* ******** Very assuring interaction.  A big thank you.
Doctor explained in great detail the issues which we were concerned with about our twins.She gave ample time to first discuss all the doubts that we had before she examined each kid.

DR. Sujata is a genuine friendly doctor. Went for my babies vaccination, in absence of her regular doctor. She was so warm and cordial. Was very happy with my visit to her clinic. Well maintained clinic.
Doctor is very friendly also very experienced doctor .And all is very good staff is also very supportive

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Excellent... Excellent... Excellent. Satisfied with your Consultancy.. Co-operative and Experiensed. Thank you Madam.
Good experience... She listened patiently... And then examined my kid. One dose of medicine prescribed results positive.
